message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start to the game!
You got lucky this time, but I'll take a bigger cut next round!
I'll give you a bit more this time, but don't get too comfortable!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it! Time to take the last crumbs.
I'm not giving up yet! Take a smaller share, but it's still a fair deal!
You're running out of options, I'm calling the shots now!
I'm making one last push for a fair deal. Meet me in the middle!
